item.title: Trinity Sword Prayer
item.description:
Trinity Sword Prayer

Father,

Never entertain sin or thoughts of sin! Upon the first whiff of sin immediately draw the sword and pray:

item.title: Dawn of Eternity
item.description:
Dawn of Eternity

I woke completely disoriented, my cheek and nose planted firmly in the sand. Waves crashed upon the sandy shore, gently highlighted by dawn's first light. That's befuddling. I live nowhere near the beach and even further from any ocean. How had I gotten here?

item.title: Discipline
item.description:
Discipline

Discipline frees us so we have more time and energy to not only do what we’re avoiding, but so much more besides. Discipline requires humility and humility leads to discipline. If discipline causes burden, we’re doing it wrong.

item.title: Writer’s Prayer
item.description:
Writer’s Prayer

Lord, give me a pencil and paper that I may joyously point to your infinite wonder with flawed words, weep at this pilgrims’ journey of sorrows, and harken to hope that you travel these travails and triumphs beside us and await us with open arms over the horizon! Amen.

item.title: One Man, One Woman
item.description:
One Man, One Woman

Are you struggling in your marriage? Wondering how in the world one man and one woman can be with each other for life? Perhaps you are struggling for the simple reason that you aren’t aiming high enough. Do you hunger for something greater in your marriage? Then strive to live up to your marriage! Prayer for Humble obedience to God.

item.title: Husband’s Prayer
item.description:
Husband’s Prayer

Lord Jesus my Christ, grant me the grace of humble obedience to you, that I may love and serve my Bride as you love and serve our Church, your Bride. Amen.

item.title: Wife’s Prayer
item.description:
Wife’s Prayer

Lord Jesus my Christ, grant me the grace of humble obedience to you and my Beloved, that I may love and serve my Groom as Holy Mary loves and serves as handmaid of the Lord. Amen

item.title: Fight Burden with Humble Obedience
item.description:
Fight Burden with Humble Obedience

Prayer when burdened

Lord, where I am burdened grant me humble obedience to you! Amen!

item.title: Why a Chaste Engagement Matters
item.description:
Why a Chaste Engagement Matters

Why a Chaste Engagement Matters COMMENTARY My fiancé, Chris, and I are not living together. And it doesn't make sense. More accurately, it doesn't make sense to the world. Currently, we pay my mortgage, his rent, two utility bills and a food bill consisting mainly of restaurant tabs.

item.title: Homeschooled: How American Homeschoolers Measure Up
item.description:
Homeschooled: How American Homeschoolers Measure Up

Share this infographic on your site! Embed this infographic on your site! Once upon a time, all children were homeschooled. But around 150 years ago states started making public school mandatory and homeschooling eventually became illegal. It wasn't until the 90's that all states made it legal again.
